item_prototype.name: Board {#BOARDID} Inbound Throughput
item_prototype.description: Inbound Speed

item_prototype.name: Board {#BOARDID} Interconnect
item_prototype.description: Outbound Speed

item_prototype.name: Board {#BOARDID} Maximum Throughput
item_prototype.description: Maximum Speed

item_prototype.name: Board {#BOARDID} Outbound Throughput
item_prototype.description: Outbound Speed

item_prototype.name: Disk Group {#DISKGID} Disk Reads
item_prototype.description: The number of host reads per second for the disk.

item_prototype.name: Disk Group {#DISKGID} Disk Writes
item_prototype.description: The number of host writes per second for the disk.

item_prototype.name: Disk Group {#DISKGID} IO Density
item_prototype.description: The number of BE requests per GB of disk

item_prototype.name: Disk Group {#DISKGID} IOs
item_prototype.description: The number of IO commands to the disk.

item_prototype.name: Disk Group {#DISKGID} Read Throughput
item_prototype.description: The average throughput of host MBs read (per second) by the director.

item_prototype.name: Disk Group {#DISKGID} Write Throughput
item_prototype.description: The average throughput of host MBs written (per second) by the director.

item_prototype.name: Disk Group {#DISKGID} Percent Busy
item_prototype.description: The percent of time that the disk is busy serving IOs.

item_prototype.name: Disk Group {#DISKGID} Percent Capacity Free
item_prototype.description: The percent of the disk that is free.

item_prototype.name: Disk Group {#DISKGID} Percent Capacity Used
item_prototype.description: The percent of the disk group capacity that is allocated.

item_prototype.name: Disk Group {#DISKGID} Total Capacity
item_prototype.description: The total capacity of the disk (GBs).

item_prototype.name: Disk Group {#DISKGID} Used Capacity
item_prototype.description: The total used capacity of the disk (GBs).

item_prototype.name: Disk Group {#DISKGID} Write Response Time
item_prototype.description: The average time it took the disk to serve one write command.

item_prototype.name: {#DIRID} Host IO Limit IOs
item_prototype.description: The number of IOs the FE director is processing.

item_prototype.name: {#DIRID} Host IO Limit Throughput
item_prototype.description: The number of MBs the FE director is processing.

item_prototype.name: {#DIRID} Syscall Count
item_prototype.description: The total number of calls seen by this director.

item_prototype.name: {#SGID} Backend Read Requests
item_prototype.description: The number of read requests each second performed by the disk directors to cache.

item_prototype.name: {#SGID} Backend Requests
item_prototype.description: The number of read/write requests each second performed by the disk directors to cache.

item_prototype.name: {#SGID} Backend Write Requests
item_prototype.description: The number of write requests each second performed by the disk directors to cache.

item_prototype.name: {#SGID} Cache Hits
item_prototype.description: The number of host read/write operations performed each second by the group that were immediately satisfied from cache.

item_prototype.name: {#SGID} Host IO Limit Percent Time Exceeded
item_prototype.description: Host I/O Limit percentage time exceeded.

item_prototype.name: {#SGID} IO
item_prototype.description: The number of host operations performed each second by the group.

item_prototype.name: {#SGID} Read Throughput
item_prototype.description: The cumulative number of host MBs read per second by the group.

item_prototype.name: {#SGID} Throughput
item_prototype.description: The cumulative number of host MBs read/writes per second by the group.

item_prototype.name: {#SGID} Write Throughput
item_prototype.description: The cumulative number of host MBs written per second by the group.

item_prototype.name: {#SGID} Cache Misses
item_prototype.description: The number of host read/write operations performed each second by the group that could not be satisfied from cache.

item_prototype.name: {#SGID} Read IO
item_prototype.description: The number of host read operations performed each second by the group.

item_prototype.name: {#SGID} Write IO
item_prototype.description: The number of host write operations performed each second by the group.

item_prototype.name: {#SGID} Cache Percent Hits
item_prototype.description: The percent of read operations, performed by the group, that were immediately satisfied by cache.

item_prototype.name: {#SGID} Cache Percent Misses
item_prototype.description: The percent of read miss operations performed each second by the group. A miss occurs when the requested read data is not found in cache.

item_prototype.name: {#SGID} Percent Read
item_prototype.description: The percent of IO operations that were reads.

item_prototype.name: {#SGID} Percent Write
item_prototype.description: The percent of IO operations that were writes.

item_prototype.name: {#SGID} RDF Response Time
item_prototype.description: The RDF round trip time. The metric is calculated as follows : RDF Accumulated Service Time / (RDF Reads/sec + RDF Writes/sec) rolled up from the RDF devices in the group.

item_prototype.name: {#SGID} RDFS Write Response Time
item_prototype.description: A summary of the read, write, and average response times for the selected SRDF/S group.

item_prototype.name: {#SGID} Read Response Time
item_prototype.description: The calculated average read response time.

item_prototype.name: {#SGID} Response Time
item_prototype.description: The calculated average response time.

item_prototype.name: {#SGID} VAAI Total Command Count
item_prototype.description: Number of VAAI commands issued.

item_prototype.name: {#SGID} Write Pending Count
item_prototype.description: The number of tracks currently in write pending mode for the group.

item_prototype.name: {#SGID} Write Paced Delay
item_prototype.description: Write paced delay.

item_prototype.name: {#SGID} Write Response Time
item_prototype.description: The calculated average write response time

item_prototype.name: Storage Group Response Time Health Score
Backend Utilization
item_prototype.description: Percentage of time the BE is busy

item_prototype.name: Cache Balance
item_prototype.description: Balance information for Cache. Balance metrics measure hardware components balance. It is calculated as the difference between the maximum and minimum values for "% Busy" for the component instances. In a balanced system the balance metrics should be relatively low.

item_prototype.name: DA Balance
item_prototype.description: Balance information for DA. Balance metrics measure hardware components balance. It is calculated as the difference between the maximum and minimum values for "% Busy" for the component instances. In a balanced system the balance metrics should be relatively low.

item_prototype.name: Disk Utilization
item_prototype.description: Percentage of time the Disk is busy

item_prototype.name: DX Balance
item_prototype.description: Balance information for DA. Balance metrics measure hardware components balance. It is calculated as the difference between the maximum and minimum values for "% Busy" for the component instances. In a balanced system the balance metrics should be relatively low.

item_prototype.name: EFD Balance
item_prototype.description: Balance information for EFD. Balance metrics measure hardware components balance. It is calculated as the difference between the maximum and minimum values for "% Busy" for the component instances. In a balanced system the balance metrics should be relatively low.

item_prototype.name: FC Balance
item_prototype.description: Balance information for FC. Balance metrics measure hardware components balance. It is calculated as the difference between the maximum and minimum values for "% Busy" for the component instances. In a balanced system the balance metrics should be relatively low.

item_prototype.name: Frontend Utilization
item_prototype.description: Percentage of time the BE is busy

item_prototype.name: FE Balance
item_prototype.description: Balance information for FE. Balance metrics measure hardware components balance. It is calculated as the difference between the maximum and minimum values for "% Busy" for the component instances. In a balanced system the balance metrics should be relatively low.

item_prototype.name: Percent of Metadata Used for Backend
Percent of Metadata Used for Frontend
Percent of Metadata Used for Replication
Percent of Metadata Used for System
RDF Utilization
item_prototype.description: Percentage of time the Disk is busy

item_prototype.name: RDF Balance
item_prototype.description: Balance information for DA. Balance metrics measure hardware components balance. It is calculated as the difference between the maximum and minimum values for "% Busy" for the component instances. In a balanced system the balance metrics should be relatively low.

item_prototype.name: SATA Balance
item_prototype.description: Balance information for SATA. Balance metrics measure hardware components balance. It is calculated as the difference between the maximum and minimum values for "% Busy" for the component instances. In a balanced system the balance metrics should be relatively low.

item_prototype.name: SCM Balance
item_prototype.description: Balance information for SCM. Balance metrics measure hardware components balance. It is calculated as the difference between the maximum and minimum values for "% Busy" for the component instances. In a balanced system the balance metrics should be relatively low.
